name: Healthyfied Bellpepper Quinoa
description: Dive into a nutritious journey with our Healthyfied Bellpepper Quinoa recipe! Tagged with low-sodium and low-sugar, this meal is perfect for those looking to enjoy healthy recipes without compromising on taste. Savor the simplicity and health benefits in every bite.

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse the Quinoa under cold water until the water runs clear.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the Quinoa according to package instructions until fluffy and fully cooked, about 15 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: While the Quinoa is cooking, finely dice the Red Bell Pepper.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: In a separate pan, lightly sauté the diced Red Bell Pepper for about 5 minutes until slightly soft.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the cooked Quinoa and sautéed Red Bell Pepper in a bowl. Mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5
